title: Luxury Brands Look to South Korea for China Sales Boost - WSJ
text:
Luxury Brands Look to South Korea for China Sales Boost Luxury Brands Look to South Korea for China Sales Boost This copy is for your personal, non-commercial use only. Distribution and use of this material are governed by

Dow Jones Reprints at 1-800-843-0008 or visit www.djreprints.com. http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052702303802104579450812059067876.html By Updated March 20, 2014 8:44 am ET To succeed in China, luxury brands are getting help from South Korea. Korean style, from viral K-Pop videos to fried chicken, is all the rage in China and brands are increasingly using it to reach Chinese consumers. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
